content.question: Which of the following will occur when wage rates decrease in a given labor market?

choices.label: The supply of labor will decrease.
The demand for labor will increase.
The quantity supplied of labor will decrease.
The quantity demanded of labor will decrease.
The supply of labor will decrease and the demand for labor will increase.

content.answer: The quantity supplied of labor will decrease.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
